name: celestialcombat
description: Top-down 2D space shooter -- galactic conquest and colonization

scripts.bundle-js: yarn generate-env ; NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/client/index.ts --experimental-scope-hoisting --out-dir client
scripts.zip-assets: cd assets ; rm -r .DS_Store ; rm assets.zip ; zip -x '.DS_Store' -r -X ../assets.zip .
scripts.build: yarn bundle-js ; yarn generate-how-to-play-page ; yarn zip-assets
